snippet.title: Indie Impressions - Where Is My Hammer
snippet.description:
Today we're going to check out Where Is My Hammer by developer TocoGames - designed for the GameJolt "Indies vs. Pewdiepie" game jam. How much physics-enabled destruction do you think UE4 is capable of displaying? You might be surprised by the results! Check out Where Is My Hammer for free at the link below.

Download: http://gamejolt.com/games/action/where-is-my-hammer/39931/

Any support for the show you feel I deserve - including "likes", comments and favorites - are a huge help to raise awareness of what I'm doing and the indie games I cover. For more check out the links below:

- The official show site: http://indie-impressions.com

- Catch me live at: http://www.twitch.tv/rockleesmile

- Follow me on Twitter: @RockLeeSmile and @Indieimpression

- 'Like' my Indie Impressions Facebook page and keep updated on what's going on every day! 
https://www.facebook.com/IndieImpressions

- Follow my Steam Curator recommendations page:
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/6872266/

- Official Indie Impressions Greenlight Collection:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96254946

Got a game suggestion for me? Let me know! New ideas are always welcome. Indie Devs: I will also try to schedule a video upload with you for your game launch if you'd like a little help getting the word out!
